name: Null Gravity
description:
WITH GRAVITY AT YOUR DISPOSAL, WILL YOU ESCAPE THE STATION?

Null Gravity is a platformer set in a perilous space station, in which you play as an astronaut faced with the daunting task of escaping a recent alien invasion. Luckily, you have the power of gravity on your side, allowing you to toggle the artificial gravity system put in place at the station.

CONTROLS

WASD/Arrow Keys - Movement

Space Bar - Jump

Lft Ctrl/Lft Mouse Button - Toggle Gravity

Made during Global Game Jam 2020.

TEAM CREDITS

Bernardo Martins: Level Designer, 2D Artist

Inês Duarte: 2D Artist

Luís Chaves: Developer

Luís Moniz: Developer

Maria Bucho: Concept Development

Mário Reis: Sound Designer, 2D Artist
